wikipedia_page.main: Henry Bentley Hancock (late 1874 – 1924) was an English professional footballer. An inside left or centre forward, he played in the Football League for  Blackpool, Oldham Athletic and  West Bromwich Albion, but was also on the books of Stockport County and  Manchester City.

response: *Harry Hancock, a professional footballer, was born in Levenshulme.
* Harry Hancock – played in the Football League

The club's league top-scorer accolade was a three-way tie between new signings Jimmy Connor, Harry Hancock and E. Francis, with six apiece. Hancock became the outright top scorer after his three goals during Blackpool's FA Cup run.Calley, Roy (1992). Blackpool: A Complete Record 1887-1992, Breedon Books Sport
